sql.item: select to_char(t.start_time, 'dd"日"hh24"时"') start_time, t.gsm_wireless_fail_rate, t.gsm_wireless_jam_rate, t.gsm_wireless_succ_rate, t.td_wireless_fail_rate, t.lte_wireless_succ_rate, t.lte_wireless_fail_rate, t.lte_call_succ_rate, t.td_wireless_traffail_rate from EMG_PM_INDICATOR t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_PM_INDICATOR a where a.region_id = ${region_id})

select t.start_time, t.ne_type name, t.msc_num value from EMG_MSC t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_MSC a where a.region_id = ${region_id}) order by msc_num desc

select t.start_time, t.ne_type name, t.mgw_num value from EMG_MGW t where t.region_id = ${region_id} and t.start_time = (select max(start_time) from EMG_MGW a where a.region_id = ${region_id}) order by mgw_num desc
